thread.title: Suspect in Sandusky, Toledo boat thefts arrested in Canada
thread.title_full: Suspect in Sandusky, Toledo boat thefts arrested in Canada

author: 13abc
title: Suspect in Sandusky, Toledo boat thefts arrested in Canada
text:
SANDUSKY, Ohio (13abc Action News) - Canadian authorities arrested the man accused of stealing boats in Toledo and Sandusky, according to information provided to Detective Gary Wichman with the Sandusky Police Department.
The U.S. border patrol told Wichman that 60-year-old Ghassan Ibrahim was arrested over the weekend in Saskatchewan, Canada. The agents said Ibrahim set his truck on fire near Plentywood, Montana before fleeing the country.
As of Tuesday, it was unclear when or if police will be able to take Ibrahim into custody. Detective Wichman said it depends on the nature of his charges in Canada.
